subject: Update CLAUDE.md with development guardrails and workflow standards
body:
Merge project-specific content (tech stack, structure, conventions) with
behavioral rules: hard rules checklist, code organization thresholds,
decision documentation requirements, UX principles, cleanup discipline,
quality checks, workflow steps, and prohibitions. Add docs/working for
plans and scratch files.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01JmT4212sKyYf38N683Tr5S
title: Update CLAUDE.md with development guardrails and workflow standards
